clients.title: Background Checks No Longer Required for Lawyer LSAs
description: In a recent announcement, Google confirmed that lawyers no longer need to go through an additional background check to achieve "Google Screened" status for their Local Services Ads (LSAs). Learn more about this change and what it means for lawyers.
